# Picture Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Default

**Appearance Class:** `app-picture`

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Rounded | `app-picture img-rounded` |
| Circle | `app-picture img-circle` |

---

## Appearance: Thumbnail

**Appearance Class:** `app-picture img-thumbnail`
